hero.title: Your Perfect Getaway
hero.subtitle: Experience authentic small-town Thailand living in our cozy tiny homes.

seo.title: Phimai Pond House - Cozy Tiny Homes in Thailand
seo.description: Stay in cozy tiny homes at Phimai Pond House, Thailand. Minutes from Phimai Historical Park and Sai Ngam mangrove. Free bikes, kitchenette, and authentic Thai experience.
seo.keywords: Phimai accommodation, Thailand tiny homes, Phimai Historical Park, vacation rental Thailand, small town Thailand, Khmer temple, Sai Ngam, Nakhon Ratchasima

gallery.title: Our Tiny Homes
gallery.subtitle: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and adventure in our thoughtfully designed tiny homes.

captions.pond: Our peaceful pond setting with lily pads, aquatic plants, and the main building reflected in the water
captions.bikes: Complimentary bikes to explore Phimai at your own pace
captions.exterior: Our charming tiny home exterior with modern design
captions.living: Comfortable living area with all essentials
captions.familySuite: Spacious family accommodation for larger groups
captions.kitchenette: Fully equipped kitchenette for your convenience

location.title: Discover Phimai
location.description: Nestled in the heart of Phimai, you'll enjoy the tranquility of open spaces while staying just minutes from the ancient Phimai Historical Park and the iconic Sai Ngam mangrove. Free bike rentals included for effortless exploration.

about.title: Your Home Away From Home
about.intro: Enjoy small town living when you stay in our cozy tiny homes. We offer the tranquility of open spaces without sacrificing comfort. Walk or bike to local dining, markets, and attractions— the ancient Phimai Historical Park and the iconic Sai Ngam mangrove - all just minutes away.

familySuite.title: Perfect for Groups
familySuite.description: In addition to our tiny homes, we offer a family suite that may accommodate 6 or more people.

amenities.title: Each home includes:
amenities.washingMachine: A washing machine and drying rack for your convenience
amenities.kitchenette: A kitchenette with essential appliances and utensils—perfect for preparing meals with local market finds
amenities.essentials: A refrigerator, hairdryer, dishes, and other home essentials
amenities.transfer: Complimentary transfer to local bus station via tuktuk (minimum 3 nights stay)
amenities.bikes: Free bike rentals, so that you can explore on your own

booking.title: Book Your Stay
booking.subtitle: Ready to experience Phimai? Book directly through our trusted platforms!

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Have questions about your stay? We're here to help with availability, special requests, or any information you need about Phimai and our tiny homes.

seo.title: Phimai Pond House - Cozy Tiny Homes in Thailand

seo.title: Insider's Guide to Phimai - Discover Ancient Temples & Local Culture
seo.description: Your insider's guide to Phimai, Thailand. Explore the ancient Khmer temple, Sai Ngam banyan trees, local markets, and authentic Isaan cuisine.
seo.keywords: Phimai guide, Phimai Historical Park, Sai Ngam, Isaan culture, Thailand travel
